'''[[Isaac Asimov]]''' (1920â€“1992) was a science fiction writer.
'''Asimov''' may also refer to:
;Places *[[Asimov (crater)]], an impact crater on Mars, named after Isaac Asimov *[[5020 Asimov]], an asteroid named after Isaac Asimov
;Other *[[Asimov (surname)]] *''[[Asimov's Science Fiction]]'', an American science fiction magazine named after Isaac Asimov *''[[Asimov's SF Adventure Magazine]]'', a short-lived American science fiction magazine named after Isaac Asimov *[[Isaac Asimov Awards]], four separate awards established in honor of Isaac Asimov
==See also== *[[ASIMO]] *[[Azimov]], Russian last name
{{Disambiguation}}
